author: Ally
text: All the best for your upcoming nuptials. Thank you for all of your hard work, which makes CampJS so great.

author: David Mason
text:
Thanks for a bunch of great camps. Enjoy your wedding, away from us :(

We'll be fine....  ...

..

I hope

author: Rod
text:
Woohoo! You both make an amazing team, with your skills and personalities complementing each other. It's exciting to see you make it a permanent thing!

Thanks both for CampJS, particularly you Wei who does so much in the background without much visibility. We look forward to what you have to offer JS in our region in the future.

author: Josh Johnston
text: It was really great getting to meet you both at campjs. Congratulations!

author: Andre Vidic
text: First time JS camper :-) Thank you both for physically bringing together a wonderful community and shaping it in your fantastic way. We are all better bec use of events like this. It was a fantastic weekend. Not suprising as two fantastic people were behind it. Keep being fantastic. Congratulations on the wedding announcement with the best of wishes :-)

author: Garrows
text: Congrats guys. Thanks for everything. See you at the next one.

author: Adam Brady
text: You guys make an excellent couple, congratulation!

author: Phil Au
text:
Congrats Wei and Tim.

Oh Tim, I'd just like to thank you personally for your tips and want to let you know that I created my first node server that routes to different address using node http!

Cheers

author: Chinmay
text: Congratulations to Tim and Wei! I'm so happy for the two of you!

author: Joshua Koo
text:
I'm sure the best way to put it but during this time that being ill at CampJS demonstrate that you Tim and Wei (especially) showing more care more for me than I would have for myself.

It is awesome to have two people who are kind and cares to be together because there would be more love and kindness around.

CampJS is great but I look forward that your marriage is greater.

Congrats! <3
